sect2.title: Installation of ASH
sect2.para: Install ASH by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../ash-0.4.0-cumulative_fixes-1.patch && make && install -m 755 sh /bin/ash && install -m 644 sh.1 /usr/share/man/man1/ash.1

sect2.para: If you would like to make ash the default sh shell, make a symlink.
